it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View

Class PrivateView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.Observable<ResponseInput>
      • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.PrivateView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<RequestInput>

    public class PrivateView
extends Observable<ResponseInput>
implements Observer<RequestInput>
    This class implements the view of the client that handles the inputs the CLI or GUI and memorizes the copy Immutable of the model
    Author:
    Cysko7927

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrivateView

        public PrivateView(int technology,
                   java.lang.String ip,
                   int port,
                   boolean gui,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String action_hero_comment)
            throws java.io.IOException
        it Creates The private view and depending on the user's choices creates a network handler(RMI or Socket)
        Parameters:
        technology - it represents the choice of the user (RMI or Socket)
        ip - ip address of the server
        port - port tcp of the server
        gui - it represent if the user chooses the gui or not
        action_hero_comment - action-hero comment inserted by user
        name - name inserted by user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are problem with the network handler

      • update

        public void update(RequestInput message)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method being used by network handler to save the message of request input that is arrived now from server with a notify. The message being saved in the buffer and awake the thread of startRound that it was waiting a message of request
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer<RequestInput>
        Parameters:
        message - message that will use to ask the inputs at the user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the observer launch an exception
